There are 100 comfortable rooms ready for a seeking quiet,comfortable and modern rooms with lovely views over brno;you can choose from three quality standards:STANDARD,SUPERIOR and DESIGN.There are NO SMOKING and SMOKING floors and also BARRIER FREE room.
